A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I had high hopes for this movie and now I feel completely betrayed as a life long fan. Rian Johnson made a mess in Episode 8. Imagine Episode 7 was all about finding the legendary Luke Skywalker which fans waited 34 years to see\, only to treat him like a disposable\, pathetic after thought?  Snoke\, a powerful and mysterious figure cloaked in the force\, only to have him so easily dispersed? So much wasted potential and conflict because of lazy writing\, horrible character development and awkward comedy. So disappointed.  Either Rian Johnson hated the original trilogy\, Luke specifically or he couldn't wait to transform Starwars into Disney on ICE (i.e. princesses floating in space).  Waste of time and money
